text.__SUMMARY__: Begonia elaeagnifolia is a plant species in the family Begoniaceae, native to Africa from Cameroon to the Congo. Its small flowers are white-tipped pink.
text.Synonyms:
Begonia schultzei Engl. ex R.Wilczek
Begonia wilczekiana N.Hallé
text.References:
D. Oliver, Fl. trop. Afr. 2:579. 1871
